S04bsu019_u:8: ekasmin samaye bhagavān śrāvastyāṃ viharati sma jetavane 'nāthapiṇḍadasyārāme mahatā bhikṣusaṃghena sārdhamardhatrayodaśabhirbhikṣuśataiḥ saṃbahulaiśca bodhisattvaśatasahasraiḥ /
S04bsu019_u:30: anye ca dvātriṃśaddevanikāyā devaputrāḥ saṃnipatitā maheśvaranārāyaṇadevaputrapūrvaṃgamāḥ /
S04bsu019_u:31: śakro devānāmindro brahmā ca sahāṃpatiścandrādityavāyuvaruṇādayo devaputrāḥ saṃnipatitāstasmin parṣadi /
S04bsu019_u:71: evaṃpramukhāṇi anekāni kinnararājaśatasahasrāṇi saṃnipatitāni tasmin parṣadi /
S04bsu019_u:125: evaṃpramukhāṇyanekāni nāgakanyā śatasahasrāṇi saṃnipatitāni tasmin parṣadi /
S04bsu019_u:234: tadā avīcau mahānarake raśmayo niścaranti sma /
S04bsu019_u:236: sarve te vihārapariśobhitā eva dṛśyante sma /
S04bsu019_u:240: layane layane suvarṇarūpyamayāni dvārāṇi dṛśyante sma /
S04bsu019_u:241: layane layane suvarṇarūpyamayāni sopānāni dṛśyante sma /
S04bsu019_u:246: bahirjetavanasya purata udyāne nānāvidhāni kalpavṛkṣāṇi dṛśyante sma /
S04bsu019_u:254: tena tatra ca ramyāvabhāse tādṛśāni kalpavṛkṣaśatasahasrāṇi prādurbhūtāni /
S04bsu019_u:255: tasminneva jetavanavihāre vajramayāṇi sopānāni dṛśyante sma,
S04bsu019_u:264: ityevaṃ tasmin jetavanavihāre samantataḥ pariśobhitāni dṛśyante sma //
S04bsu019_u:269_0: atha tasminneva parṣanmadhye sarvanīvaraṇaviṣkambhī nāma bodhisattvo mahāsattva utthāyāsanādekāṃsamuttarāsaṅgaṃ
S04bsu019_u:269_1: kṛtvā dakṣiṇaṃ jānumaṇḍalaṃ pṛthivyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpya yena bhagavāṃstenāñjaliṃ praṇamya
S04bsu019_u:273: kulaputro 'vīcau mahānarake āryāvalokiteśvaro bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ praviṣṭaḥ /
S04bsu019_u:276: atha sarvanīvaraṇaviṣkambhī bodhisattvo mahāsattvo bhagavantametadavocat - bhagavan,
S04bsu019_u:279: tatrāsya dharmaṃ deśayati - yasyāḥ kuḍyaprākāraparyantā ayomayī bhūmiḥ samanantaraprajvalitaikajvālībhūtā,
S04bsu019_u:283: yathā bahvayudakāyāṃ sthālyāṃ mudgā vā māṣā vā cordhvaṃ gacchanto 'dho gacchantaḥ svidyante pacyante,
S04bsu019_u:286: tatkathaṃ bhagavan avīcau mahānarake 'valokiteśvaro bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ praviśati?
S04bsu019_u:287: bhagavānāha - yathā kulaputra rājā cakravartī divyaratnamayodyāne praviśati mahatyā cakravartirājyasamṛddhayā,
S04bsu019_u:288: evameva kulaputra avalokiteśvaro bodhisattvo mahāsattvastasminnavīcau mahānarake praviśati /
S04bsu019_u:292: tadā te yamapālapurūṣāḥ saṃvegacittāḥ paramodvignāścintāṃ samāpadyante - kimasminnavīcau mahānarake 'śubhanimittaṃ prādurbhūtam?
S04bsu019_u:297: atha te yamapālapurūṣā asimusalabhindipālatomaragadācakratriśūlādīnupasaṃgṛhya sarvaṃ cāvīcipariṣkāraṃ gṛhītvā yena sa yamo dharmarājastenopasaṃkrāntāḥ /
S04bsu019_u:298: upasaṃkramya yamaṃ dharmarājametadavocan - yatkhalu devo jānīyāt prathamam - sā cāsmākaṃ karmabhūmirniravaśeṣaṃ parikṣīṇā abhiramaṇīyā saṃvṛttā sarvasukhasamarpitā /
S04bsu019_u:299: yamo dharmarājastānuvāca - kiṃkāraṇaṃ yuṣmākamapi karmabhūmiḥ parikṣīṇā?
S04bsu019_u:301: yatkhalu devo jānīyāt prathamam - tasminnavīcimahānarake 'śubhanimittaṃ prādurbhūtam /
S04bsu019_u:303: kāmarūpī ca tatra puruṣaḥ praviṣṭo jaṭāmukuṭadharo divyālaṃkārabhūṣitaśarīraḥ paramamaitramānasaḥ suvarṇabimbamiva dṛśyate /
S04bsu019_u:308: atha sa yamo dharmarājaścintāmāpede - kasya punardevasyāyaṃ prabhāvaḥ?
S04bsu019_u:311: athavā anyeṣāṃ maharddhikadevaputrāṇāmapi varapradānenedṛśaṃ phalaviśeṣaṃ saṃvṛttam?
S04bsu019_u:315: sa ca divyena cakṣuṣā vyavalokya tacca devanikāyena paśyati sma - īdṛśaṃ varaṃ kasyānyasya?
S04bsu019_u:316: atha sa punarevāvīcau mahānarake vyavalokayati sma /
S04bsu019_u:317: vyavalokya tasminnevāvīcau mahānarake 'valokiteśvaraṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvameva paśyati sma //
S04bsu019_u:318: atha sa yamo dharmarājo yenāvalokiteśvaro bodhisattvo mahāsattvastenopasaṃkrāntaḥ /
S04bsu019_u:319: upasaṃkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasābhivandya stotraviśeṣaṃ kartumārabdhaḥ /
S04bsu019_u:378: evaṃ yamo dharmarājo viśeṣataraṃ srotāvadhānaṃ kṛtvā punarapi yamo dharmarājaḥ triḥ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya tatraiva prakrānto 'bhūt //
S04bsu019_u:383: atha sarvanīvaraṇaviṣkambhī bhagavantametadavocat - kadā bhagavannāgacchati avalokiteśvaro bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ?
S04bsu019_u:384: bhagavānāha - eṣa kulaputra avīcīmahānarakānniṣkramya pretanagaraṃ praviṣṭaḥ /
S04bsu019_u:385: tatrānekāni pretaśatasahasrāṇi purastāddhāvanti sma dagdhasthūṇākṛtibhirasthiyantravaducchritaiḥ parvatodarasaṃnibhaiḥ sūcīcchidropamamukhaiḥ /
S04bsu019_u:389: sa ca dvārapālapurūṣa udbaddhabhiṇḍipālaḥ kālakūṭavyagrahasto lohitākṣaḥ /
S04bsu019_u:390: satatamasyānubhāvena maitracittaṃ saṃbhāvayati - na ca me īdṛśena karmabhūminā kṛtyam //
S04bsu019_u:391: athāryāvalokiteśvaro bodhisattvo mahāsattvastaṃ ca sattvanikāyaṃ dṛṣṭvā mahākaruṇācittamutpādya daśabhyo hastāṅgulībhyo daśa vaitaraṇīrniṣkrāmayati /
S04bsu019_u:393: atikaruṇābhibhūtacetasā avalokiteśvarasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya teṣāṃ sattvānāmantike sarvaromakūpebhyo 'ṣṭāṅgavāriparipūrṇā mahānadyo niṣkrāmanti /
S04bsu019_u:398: tadā mānuṣikīṃ cetanāmupādāyaiva sāṃsārikīṃ cintāṃ vicintayanti - aho bata te jāmbudvīpakā manuṣyāḥ sukhitāḥ,
S04bsu019_u:404: te satpurūṣāḥ sacetanā ye mahāyānaṃ satatasamitamavagāhayanti /
S04bsu019_u:405: te satpuruṣā ye āryāstān gomārgāya vāsamupavasanti /
S04bsu019_u:407: te satpuruṣāḥ ye truṭitasphuṭitān vihārān pratisaṃskāraṃ kurvanti,
S04bsu019_u:409: te satpuruṣā ye pūrvikāni stūpabimbāni truṭitasphuṭitāni viśīrṇabhūtāni pratisaṃskāraṃ kurvanti /
S04bsu019_u:410: te satpuruṣā ye dharmabhāṇakāṃllekhakān dhārakān vācakān sūtrarājasya śrāvakān satatasamitaṃ parisevanti copatiṣṭhanti ca /
S04bsu019_u:411: te satpurūṣā ye tathāgataprātihāryāṇi vividhāni ca tathāgatacaṃkramaṇāni dharmasarāṇi ca paśyanti /
S04bsu019_u:414: te satpuruṣā ye bodhisattvavikurvitāni caṃkramaṇāni paśyanti /
S04bsu019_u:415: ityevaṃ te pretaviṣayaṃ śarīramanuvicintya mānasānāṃ kāmānāmabhāvopapattiṃ prati parityajanti /
S04bsu019_u:417: tadā teṣāṃ viṃśatiśikhara samudgataṃ satkāyadṛṣṭiśailaṃ jñānavajreṇa bhittvā sarve te sukhāvatyāṃ lokadhātāvupapannāḥ ākāṅkṣitamukhā nāma bodhisattvā upapannāḥ /
S04bsu019_u:418: athāvalokiteśvaro yadā te sattvadhātavaḥ parimokṣitāḥ suparimuktāśca,
S04bsu019_u:429: nāsti kulaputra īdṛśaṃ pratibhānaṃ tathāgatānāmapi yādṛśamāryāvalokiteśvarasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya //
S04bsu019_u:430: atha sarvanīvaraṇaviṣkambhī āha - kena prakāreṇa bhagavan?
S04bsu019_u:431_0: bhagavānāha - bhūtapūrvaṃ kulaputra vipaśyī nāma tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho
S04bsu019_u:431_1: loka udapādi vidyācaraṇasaṃpannaḥ sugato lokavidanuttaraḥ puruṣadamyasārathiḥ śāstā
S04bsu019_u:431_2: devānāṃ ca manuṣyāṇāṃ ca buddho bhagavān /
S04bsu019_u:432: tena kālena tena samayenāhaṃ sarvanīvaraṇaniṣkambhin sugandhamukho nāma vaṇikputro 'bhūvam /
S04bsu019_u:433: tadā me śrutā vipaśyinastathāgatasya sakāśādāryāvalokiteśvarasya guṇodbhāvanā //
S04bsu019_u:434: atha sarvanīvaraṇaviṣkambhī bhagavantametadavocat - kīdṛśī tvayā bhagavan guṇodbhāvanā śrutā?
S04bsu019_u:437: yādṛśī tvayā bhagavan guṇodbhāvanā āryāvalokiteśvarasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya śrutā //
S04bsu019_u:448: athāryāvalokiteśvaro bodhisattvo mahāsattvo maheśvaraṃ devaputrametadavocat - bhaviṣyasi tvaṃ maheśvaraḥ kaliyuge pratipanne /
S04bsu019_u:454: īdṛśaṃ mayā kulaputra vipaśyinastathāgatasya sakāśādāryāvalokiteśvarasya guṇodbhāvanā śrutā //
S04bsu019_u:455: tadapyatikramya śikhī nāma tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho babhūva vidyācaraṇasaṃpannaḥ sugato lokavidanuttaraḥ puruṣadamyasārathiḥ śāstā devānāṃ ca manuṣyāṇāṃ ca buddho bhagavān /
S04bsu019_u:456: tena kālena tena samayenāhaṃ sarvanīvaraṇaviṣkambhin dānaśūro nāma bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'bhūvam /
S04bsu019_u:457: tasya śikhinastathāgatasya sakāśādavalokiteśvarasya bodhisattvasya mahāsatvasya guṇodbhāvanā śrutā //
S04bsu019_u:462: atha sarvanīvaraṇaviṣkambhī bhagavantametadavocat - kīdṛśī bhagavaṃstvayā guṇodbhāvanā avalokiteśvarasya śrutā?
S04bsu019_u:463: bhagavānāha - yadā sarvadevā nāgā yakṣā gandharvā rākṣasā asurā maruto garūḍā gandharvāḥ kinnarā mahoragā manuṣyāḥ saṃnipatitāḥ saṃniṣaṇṇā abhūvan,
S04bsu019_u:465: mahāsaṃnipātaṃ dṛṣṭvā tāsāṃ parṣadāṃ madhye dharmasāṃkathyaṃ kartumārabdhaḥ /
S04bsu019_u:466: tadā bhagavato mukhadvārānnānāvarṇā anekaraśmayo niḥsaranti sma /
S04bsu019_u:468: niścaritvā ca daśadigvidikṣu sarvān lokān dhātunavabhāsya punarevāgatya taṃ śikhinaṃ bhagavantaṃ triḥpradakṣiṇīkṛtya bhagavato mukhadvāre praviṣṭāḥ //
S04bsu019_u:474_0: atha tasminneva parṣadi ratnapāṇirnāma bodhisattvo mahāsattva utthāyāsanādekāṃsamuttarāsaṅgaṃ
S04bsu019_u:474_1: kṛtvā dakṣiṇaṃ jānumaṇḍalaṃ pṛthivyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpya yena bhagavāṃstenāñjaliṃ praṇamya
S04bsu019_u:477: bhagavānāha - eṣa kulaputra avalokiteśvaraḥ sukhāvatyā lokadhātorāgacchati,
S04bsu019_u:478: tasya āgacchamānasyedaṃ mayedṛśaṃ nimittaṃ prādurbhūtaṃ darśitam //
S04bsu019_u:479: atha ratnapāṇirnāma bodhisattva āha - kīdṛśāni tāni nimittāni?
S04bsu019_u:481: bhagavānāha - yadā kulaputra avalokiteśvaro bodhisattvo mahāsattva āgacchati,
S04bsu019_u:493: tadyathā - hastiratnaṃ maniratnaṃ aśvaratnaṃ strīratnaṃ gṛhapatiratnaṃ pariṇāyakaratnam /
S04bsu019_u:496: yadā āryāvalokiteśvaro bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sukhāvatyā lokadhātorniṣkrāntaḥ,
S04bsu019_u:498: atha ratnapāṇirbodhisattvo mahāsattvo bhagavantametadavocat - kasya nimittāni bhagavan?
S04bsu019_u:499: bhagavānāha - eṣa kulaputra āryāvalokiteśvaro mahāsattvo bodhisattva āgacchati,
S04bsu019_u:501: yadā sa calati tadā manoramaṃ padmavarṣaḥ patati /
S04bsu019_u:502: tadā avalokiteśvaro sahasrapatrāṇi padmāni suvarṇadaṇḍāni vaidūryanirbhāsāni gṛhītvā yena bhagavāṃstenopasaṃkrāntaḥ /
S04bsu019_u:503: upasaṃkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasābhivandya bhagavatastāni padmānyupanāmayati sma - imāni te bhagavannamitābhena tathāgatenārhatā samyaksaṃbuddhena prahitāni /
S04bsu019_u:504: sa tathāgataḥ pṛcchati anātaṅkatāṃ laghutāṃ sukhasparśavihāritāṃ ca /
S04bsu019_u:505: tato bhagavatā padmāni gṛhītvā vāmapārśve sthāpitāni /
S04bsu019_u:506: tadā aryāvalokiteśvarasya guṇodbhāvanāṃ kurute - kīdṛśī tvayā avalokiteśvara karmabhūmirniṣpāditā sadā preteṣu avīcāvupapanneṣu?
S04bsu019_u:513: mahānarake ye upapannāḥ sattvāsteṣāṃ ca karmabhūmiṃ dṛṣṭvā tatra mayā sattvaparipāko me kṛtaḥ kartavyaśca /
S04bsu019_u:514: kṛtvā sarve ca anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pratiṣṭhāpayitavyāḥ /
S04bsu019_u:516: yāvatsamantāddaśabhyo digbhyaḥ sarvākṣaṇopapannāḥ sattvā arūpaviśeṣe nirvāṇadhātau na pratiṣṭhāpitā bhaveyuḥ //
S04bsu019_u:517: athāvalokiteśvaro bodhisattva idaṃ praśnavyāhāraṃ kṛtvā bhagavataḥ pādau śirasābhivandya ekānte prakāntaḥ,
S04bsu019_u:524: atha ratnapāṇirbodhisattvo bhagavantametadavocat - paripṛccheyamahaṃ bhagavan praśnavyāharaṇamuddeśam - kidṛśo 'valokiteśvarasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya puṇyasaṃbhāraḥ?
S04bsu019_u:526: nirdeśayāmi asyāvalokiteśvarasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya nāmagrahaṇāt puṇyasaṃbhārasya pramāṇam /
S04bsu019_u:527_0: tadyathā - api nāma kulaputra kecideva sattvā gaṅgānadīvālukopamāstathāgatā arhantaḥ
S04bsu019_u:531: tadyathā - api nāma kulaputra dvādaśamāsikena saṃvatsareṇa caturmahādvīpeṣu rātriṃdivamavicchinnaṃ devo varṣati,
S04bsu019_u:533: na tu kulaputra avalokiteśvarasya śakyaṃ mayā puṇyasaṃbhāraṃ gaṇayitum /
S04bsu019_u:538: na tu kulaputra avalokiteśvarasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya śakyate puṇyasaṃbhāraṃ gaṇayitum /
S04bsu019_u:539: tadyathāpi nāma kulaputra caturmahādvīpeṣu ye keciccatuṣpādā siṃhavyāghraṛkṣatarakṣumṛgoṣṭraśṛgālādayo gogardabhāḥ paśavaḥ hastino 'śvā mahiṣā mārjārādayaḥ,
S04bsu019_u:540: eteṣu catuṣpadeṣu śakyate mayaikaikaṃ romaṃ gaṇayitum /
S04bsu019_u:541: na tu kulaputra avalokiteśvarasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya śakyate puṇyasaṃbhāraṃ gaṇayitum /
S04bsu019_u:542: tadyathāpi nāma kulaputra kaścideva kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā paramāṇurajopamāstathāgatā arhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhā divyasauvarṇaratnamayān stūpān kārayeddhastaśatasahasrapramāṇam,
S04bsu019_u:544: tacchakyaṃ mayā kulaputra teṣāṃ sauvarṇarajatamayānāṃ tathāgatānāṃ karaṇeṣu puṇyaskandhaṃ gaṇayitum /
S04bsu019_u:545: na tu kulaputra avalokiteśvarasya bodhisattvasya śakyate puṇyasaṃbhāraṃ gaṇayitum /
S04bsu019_u:546: tadyathāpi nāma kulaputra śakyate mayā śīrṣavanasyaikaikaṃ patrāṇi gaṇayitum,
S04bsu019_u:547: na tvavalokiteśvarasya śakyate mayā puṇyasaṃbhāraṃ gaṇayitum /
S04bsu019_u:548: tadyathāpi nāma kulaputra caturmahādvīpeṣu strīpuruṣadārakadārikāste sarve srotāpattiphale sakṛdāgāmiphale 'nāgāmiphale 'rhattve pratyekabodhau niyojayeyam /
S04bsu019_u:555: atha ratnapāṇirbodhisattvo mahāsattvo bhagavantametadavocat - na me bhagavana kvacidīdṛśaḥ acintyastathāgatānāṃ puṇyaskandho dṛṣṭo vā śruto vā prāgeva bodhisattvabhūtasya,
S04bsu019_u:557: bhagavānāha - yatkhalu kulaputra mama sadṛśāḥ gaṅgānadīvālukopamāstathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhā bhaveyuḥ,
S04bsu019_u:560: te ca tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhāḥ sarvathaikatra saṃnipātyante /
S04bsu019_u:561: sarve avalokiteśvarasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya na śankuvanti puṇyaskandhaṃ gaṇayitum /
S04bsu019_u:562: prāgeva kulaputra ahamekākī asmin lokadhātau viharāmi,
S04bsu019_u:563: tatkathaṃ śaknuyāṃ tasya puṇyaskandhaṃ vācā vyāhartum?
S04bsu019_u:564: api ca kulaputra sarve tathāgatā daśabhyo vāgbhiḥ evaṃ vācamabhāṣanta - te sattvāḥ sukhitā loke bhavanti,
S04bsu019_u:568: te śuklapāṇḍarapaṭā iva rājahaṃsāḥ plutavāyuvegā iva gacchanti sukhāvatīlokadhātumamitābhasya tathāgatasya saṃmukhaṃ dharmaśravaṇāya /
S04bsu019_u:569: dharmaṃ śrutvā ca sāṃsārikaṃ duḥkhaṃ teṣāṃ kāye na bādhate,
S04bsu019_u:571: na ca teṣāṃ kṣutpipāsā duḥkhaṃ kāye na bādhate,
S04bsu019_u:574: dharmarasena pūryamāṇāḥ satataparigrahaṃ vyavasthāpitāḥ tāvadasmiṃllokadhātau tiṣṭhanti,
S04bsu019_u:575: yāvadavalokiteśvarasya bodhisattvasya dṛḍhapratijñā na paripūritā bhavati - sarvasattvā sarvaduḥkhebhyaḥ parimokṣitāḥ yāvadanuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodhau na pratiṣṭhāpitā bhavanti //
S04bsu019_u:576: atha ratnapāṇirbodhisattvo bhagavantametadavocat - katamena kālena bhagavato 'sya dṛḍhapratijñāṃ paripūrayati,
S04bsu019_u:578: bhagavānāha - bahubhiḥ kulaputra kāraṇaiḥ sattvāḥ kāraṇāt saṃsāre saṃsaranti,
S04bsu019_u:603: yathā yathā vaineyānāṃ sattvānāṃ tathā tathā (Vaidya 269)
S04bsu019_u:605: evaṃ kulaputra avalokiteśvaro bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sattvān dharmaṃ deśayati,
S04bsu019_u:612: atha ratnapāṇirbodhisattvo mahāsattvo bhagavantametadavocat - paramāścaryādbhutaprāpto 'haṃ bhagavan /
S04bsu019_u:613: na ca me kadācidasmābhirīdṛśo viṣayo dṛṣṭo vā śruto vā,
S04bsu019_u:616: bhagavānāha - asti kulaputra asminneva jambudvīpe vajrakukṣirnāma guhā /
S04bsu019_u:618: tatra kulaputra avalokiteśvaro bodhisattvo 'surarūpeṇāsurāṇāṃ dharmaṃ deśayati /
S04bsu019_u:620: dharmaśravaṇāyāgatānasurānevaṃ ca kathayati sma - asurāṇāṃ dharmaṃ śṛṇvantu bhavantaḥ /
S04bsu019_u:621: ye cānye 'suraparṣadaste maitracittāḥ śāntacittāḥ dayācittāḥ sattvānāmantike hitasukhacittā bhāvaṃ samanvāhṛtya imaṃ kāraṇḍavyūhaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ śrotavyam //
S04bsu019_u:622: atha te 'surāḥ kṛtakarapuṭā avalokiteśvarasyāntikamimaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ śṛṇvanti sma /
S04bsu019_u:623: te sukhitā loke ye īdṛśaṃ cintāmaṇisadṛśaṃ kāraṇḍavyūhaṃ mahāyānasūtraratnarājamabhimukhīkurvanti,
S04bsu019_u:640: te ca sarve tathāgatā āśvāsayiṣyanti - mā bhaiṣīḥ kulaputra,
S04bsu019_u:643: tatra sukhāvatyāṃ lokadhātau tavārthe vicitraṃ ca te chatraṃ sihāsanaṃ sajjīkṛtam,
S04bsu019_u:646: evaṃ sa ratnapāṇe prativiśiṣṭataraṃ puṇyaphalaṃ darśayannavalokiteśvaro bodhisattvo mahāsattvo nirvāṇikīṃ bhūmimupadarśayati sma /
S04bsu019_u:648: atha ratnapāṇirbodhisattvo mahāsattvo bhagavataḥ pādau śirasābhivandya tatraiva prakrāntaḥ //
S04bsu019_u:653: athe sarvanīvaraṇaviṣkambhī bhagavantametadavocat - atidurlabhaṃ bhagavan asyāvalokiteśvarasya vikurvitāni śrūyante guṇodbhāvanāni ca /
S04bsu019_u:659_0: tadapi samatikramya viśvabhūrnāma tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho babhūva vidyācaraṇasaṃpannaḥ
S04bsu019_u:659_1: sugato lokavidanuttaraḥ puruṣadamyasārathiḥ śāstā devānāṃ ca manuṣyāṇāṃ ca buddho bhagavān /
S04bsu019_u:660: tena kālena tena samayena ahaṃ sarvanīvaraṇaviṣkambhī bodhisattvaḥ kṣāntivādī ṛṣirabhūt girigahvarāntarakarvaṭasthānavāsī,
S04bsu019_u:662: tadā kālānukālaṃ mayā tasya viśvabhuvaḥ tathāgatasya sakāśāt guṇodbhāvanā avalokiteśvarasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya śrutā vividhasarvasattvaparipācanam /
S04bsu019_u:663_0: asti sarvanīvaraṇaviṣkambhin sā kāñcanamayī nāma bhūmirasti yaduttarasyāṃ kāñcanamayyāṃ
S04bsu019_u:663_1: bhūmyāṃ gatvā avalokiteśvaro bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'dhomukhānāṃ sattvānāṃ dharmaṃ deśayati sma /
S04bsu019_u:665: sa tataḥ kāñcanamayyā bhūmyā niṣkramitvā rūpyamayyāṃ bhūmyāṃ praviśati /
S04bsu019_u:666: tatra sa paśyati catuṣpādikāni sattvāni puruṣapudgalāni /
S04bsu019_u:667_0: dṛṣṭvā teṣāmavalokiteśvaro bodhisattvo mahāsattvo sarvasattvānāmeva dharmaṃ deśayati
S04bsu019_u:667_1: - śṛṇvantu bhavantaḥ sarve puruṣapudgalā abhimukhaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ pracalamānasucetasā nirvāṇikam /
S04bsu019_u:669: athe te sarve puruṣā avalokiteśvarasya purataḥ sthitvā etadavocat - āśvāsaya tvam /
S04bsu019_u:672: aśaraṇānāṃ sattvānāṃ śaraṇaṃ parāyaṇaṃ mātāpitṛbhūto bhava /
S04bsu019_u:675: sukhitāste sattvā ye tava satataṃ parigrahaṃ nāmamanusmaranti,
S04bsu019_u:677: idaṃ ca samāgāḍhataraṃ duḥkhaṃ na kadācitpratyanubhavanti,
S04bsu019_u:678: muñcanti te hīdṛśaṃ duḥkhaṃ yāvadyādṛśaṃ vayaṃ pratyanubhavāmaḥ //
S04bsu019_u:679: atha sa teṣāṃ sattvānāṃ kāraṇḍavyūhaṃ nama mahāyanasūtraratnarājaṃ karṇapuṭe niścārayati sma /
S04bsu019_u:680: te ca sattvā amuṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ śrutvā anyonyavihitaśrotṛkarṇapuṭā niścaranti sma /
S04bsu019_u:681: tadapi te puruṣāḥ śrutvā avaivartikabhūminiṣpāditāḥ paramasukhasamarpitāḥ saṃskṛtāḥ //
S04bsu019_u:682_0: atha āryāvalokiteśvaro bodhisattvo mahāsattvastasyā rūpamayyā niṣkramyānyatarāyāṃ
S04bsu019_u:682_1: bhūmyāṃ praviśati sattvaparipākāya mahākaruṇāsaṃpīḍitahṛdayo 'yomayyāṃ bhūmyāṃ yatra
S04bsu019_u:684: upasaṃkramya ca rājño balerasurendrasya dūrataścakṣurdarśanaṃ yāti sma suvarṇabimbamiva raśmibhiḥ pramuñcamānairnānāvarṇaiḥ //
S04bsu019_u:689: atha sa rājā balirasurendro 'valokiteśvaraṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvaṃ dūrata evāgacchantaṃ paśyati sma /
S04bsu019_u:690_1: sahasraparivārairgatvā avalokiteśvarasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya pādayornipatyedamudānayati sma -
S04bsu019_u:692: adya me saphalaṃ janma jīvitaṃ puṇyameva ca /
S04bsu019_u:693: adya me hīdṛśaṃ caiva paripūrṇaṃ manoratham // Kvyu_1,11.1 //
S04bsu019_u:694: adya me āśayaḥ pūrṇaḥ pariśuddhaśca duḥkhataḥ /
S04bsu019_u:695: yanmayā darśane samyag dṛṣṭvā lokaikabāndhavaḥ // Kvyu_1,11.2 //
S04bsu019_u:696: tadā me sarvasaukhyaṃ ca kāme saṃtiṣṭhate punaḥ /
S04bsu019_u:697: saukhyā bhavanti te sattvā sarvaduḥkhavivarjitāḥ // Kvyu_1,11.3 //
S04bsu019_u:701: atha sa rājā balistasya bhagavato 'valokiteśvarasya pādayoḥ praṇipatya ratnapīṭhakaṃ dattvā daśanakhāñjaliṃ kṛtvaivamāha -
S04bsu019_u:705: pāparatānāṃ jātyandhabhūtānāṃ paradāragamanaprasaktānāṃ prāṇātipātodyuktānāṃ paraprāṇāhiṃsakānāṃ jarāmaraṇabhayabhītānāmudvignamānasānāṃ saṃsāraduṣṭavārtānāṃ trātā bhava /
S04bsu019_u:709: eṣāmasmākaṃ bandhanabaddhānāṃ tava darśanena sarvabandhanādayaḥ parimuktāḥ,
S04bsu019_u:711: tvaddarśanamātreṇa yāni tāni rājñaścakravartinaśca śubhakarmajātāni cakravartisukhāni mama saṃvidyante,
S04bsu019_u:714: na ca punarimāni yāni sarvabandhanāni cakṣuṣu ābhāsamāgaccheyuḥ //
S04bsu019_u:715: atha āryāvalokiteśvaro bodhisattvo mahāsattvo rājānaṃ balimasurendramevamāha - ye mahārāja sattvānāmantike avihiṃsācittamutpādayanti,
S04bsu019_u:718: na ca teṣāṃ kecitsattvāḥ svapnenāpi pīḍayanti /
S04bsu019_u:724: teṣāṃ ca dharmabhāṇakānāmasya dharmaparyāyasya dhārakānāṃ vācakānāṃ lekhakānāṃ saṃśrāvakāṇām,
S04bsu019_u:725: asya ca tathāgatasya dharmaparyāyamuddiśya ekadivasamapi purobhaktamapi piṇḍapātramanupradāsyati,
S04bsu019_u:732: tasya ca bhagavato 'mitābhasya tathāgatasya purataḥ saṃmukhaṃ dharmaṃ śrutvā vyākaraṇamanuprāpsyanti /
S04bsu019_u:735: tadyathāpi nāma kulaputra ye tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya tiṣṭhataḥ parinirvṛtasya vā piṇḍapātramanuprayacchanti,
S04bsu019_u:738: dvādaśagaṅgānadīvālukopamā mama sadṛśā bodhisattvā mahāsattvā bhaveyuḥ,
S04bsu019_u:740: te 'pi sarve samagrībhūtā na śakyante ekasya piṇḍaprātrapradānasya kuśalamūlasaṃbhārasya puṇyaskandhaṃ gaṇayitum /
S04bsu019_u:742: tadyathāpi nāma kulaputra śakyate mayā paramāṇurajasāṃ pramāṇamudgrahītum /
S04bsu019_u:743: na tu kulaputra śakyaṃ mayā piṇḍapātrasya puṇyaskandhaṃ gaṇayitum /
S04bsu019_u:744: tadyathāpi nama kulaputra caturṣu mahādvīpeṣu strīpuruṣadārakadārikādayaste sarve kṛṣikarmānte udyuktā bhaveyuḥ /
S04bsu019_u:749: sarve te strīpuruṣadārakadārikādayaḥ śakaṭairbhārairmuṭaiḥ pīṭhakairuṣṭrairgobhirgardabhaiḥ sarve te mardayitvā tasmin mahākhalake mahāntaṃ rāśiṃ kuryāt /
S04bsu019_u:752: na tu kulaputra śakyate piṇḍapātrasya puṇyaskandhaṃ gaṇayitum /
S04bsu019_u:753: tadyathāpi nāma kulaputra sumeruḥ parvatarājaḥ caturaśītiyojanasahasrāṇi adhastādupagataḥ ūrdhveṇa caturaśītiyojanasahasrāṇyucchrayeṇa ca /
S04bsu019_u:756: ye caturdvīpanivāsinaḥ puruṣadārakadārikāste ca sarve lekhakā bhaveyuḥ /
S04bsu019_u:759: na tu kulaputra śakyate piṇḍapātrasya puṇyaskandhaṃ gaṇayitum /
S04bsu019_u:760: tadyathāpi nāma kulaputra lekhakāḥ sarve te daśabhūmipratiṣṭhitā bodhisattvā bhaveyuḥ paryāpannāḥ /
S04bsu019_u:761: yacca teṣāṃ daśabhūmipratiṣṭhitānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ puṇyaskandhaṃ tamekasya piṇḍapātrasya puṇyaskandhaṃ gaṇayitum /
S04bsu019_u:762: tadyathāpi nāma kulaputra gaṅgāyā nadyā vālukāsamudrasya ca śakyaṃ mayā ekaikaṃ vālukāṃ gaṇayitum,
S04bsu019_u:763: na tu kulaputra śakyate mayā piṇḍapātrasya puṇyaskandhaṃ gaṇayitum /
S04bsu019_u:764: tadyathāpi nāma kulaputra śakyate mayā sarvamaturāsrāṃ(?)
S04bsu019_u:766: na śakyaṃ mayā kulaputra piṇḍapātrasya puṇyaskandhaṃ gaṇayitum //
S04bsu019_u:767_0: atha balisurendraḥ idaṃ ca tasya bhagavato 'valokiteśvarasyāntikātpiṇḍapātrakuśalabhūtasya
S04bsu019_u:767_2: gadgadakaṇṭhaḥ bāṣpaparipūrṇa ucchvasan avalokiteśvaraṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvametadavocat
S04bsu019_u:767_3: - kīdṛśaṃ mayā bhagavan balinā karma kṛtaṃ dānaṃ dattam,
S04bsu019_u:769: sāntaḥ - puraparivāreṇa kukṣetre mayā dānaṃ dattam /
S04bsu019_u:773: yadā mayā ca bhagavan tairthikadṛṣṭiparyāpannena mānagrastamānasena ca yajñaṃ yajatā mahādānasamucchrayaṃ kartumārabdham,
S04bsu019_u:774: tadā me tatra yajñe vāmanakarūpeṇa yācanako hiṃsraḥ samāgataḥ /
S04bsu019_u:775: tasya me maulīkuṇḍalasragdāmāni ratnābharaṇāni hyaśvarathādīni muktvā ratnakavacāni marakatapralambitāni (Vaidya 273)
S04bsu019_u:776: cāmarapralambitāni muktāhārāṇi muktikājālapralambitāni muktikājālapraticchannāni muktikākalāpajālāṅgulīkāni sauvarṇaghaṇṭikārūpyanibaddhāni raṇaraṇāyamānāni, (anyāni ca)
S04bsu019_u:777: kapilāsahasrāṇi rūpyapādāni sauvarṇaśṛṅgāni muktājālapralambitāni muktikājālapraticchannāni arghapātrasamāyuktāni nānāvicitraghaṇṭāratnasamāyuktāni,
S04bsu019_u:779_0: kumārīṇāṃ śatasahasrāṇi paramayā gurvaruṇapuṣkalatayā samanvāgatānāṃ nānāvicitrāṇāṃ
S04bsu019_u:785: anekāni suvarṇarūpyamayāni daṇḍāni ratnasaṃyuktāni satataṃ vyavasthāpitāni /
S04bsu019_u:789: tasmin sa mayā rājñā śatasahasrān saṃnipatitān brāhmaṇaśatasahasraṃ saṃnipatitam /
S04bsu019_u:791: tadāhaṃ bhagavan evaṃ sthānasthitānāṃ yathāsaṃnipatitānāṃ dṛṣṭvā vismayamāpannaḥ /
S04bsu019_u:794: etatpaurvikaṃ pāpaṃ pratideśayāmi - kṣātriyabhāryāṇāṃ gurviṇīnāṃ yāvaddhṛdayaṃ sphuṭayitvā kumārakumārikā jīvitādvayaparopitāḥ /
S04bsu019_u:795: tataste ca mahākṣatriyāḥ sarve mayā haḍanigaḍabandhanairbaddhāḥ /
S04bsu019_u:796: nītvā tāmraguhāyāmanekāni kṣatriyaśatasahasrāṇi pañcabandhanabaddhāni kṛtvā sthāpitāni pañcapāṇḍavaprabhṛtīni /
S04bsu019_u:797: tasyāmeva yakṣaguhāyāmupayamāni kīlakāni śṛṅkhalāsamāyuktāni teṣāṃ kṣatriyāṇāṃ hastapādāni baddhvā sthāpitāni /
S04bsu019_u:807: ekaikadvāre pañca pañca śatāni kapāṭāni yantrasamāyuktāni /
S04bsu019_u:815: rūpaṃ kṛtvā dine dine mṛgapakṣyādinā nānājanturūpeṇa /
S04bsu019_u:818: tadātra me daśarathaputreṇāvatāraprekṣiṇā gatvā tena dvārasthāpitāḥ sapta parvatā utpāṭitāḥ /
S04bsu019_u:819: utpāṭayitvā laghunīvānyapradeśe chorayitvā uccaiḥśabdena teṣāṃ kṣatriyāṇāmārocayati (Vaidya 274)
S04bsu019_u:821: anye rājānaḥ śabdamanuśrutaṃ śrutvā samāśvāsya svasthakāyā vyavasthitāḥ /
S04bsu019_u:822: sa ca tānevamāha - jīvanto yuṣmākamathavā mṛtāḥ?
S04bsu019_u:824: tena mahāvīryeṇa puruṣeṇa sarvāṇi tāni dvārāṇi bhagnāni /
S04bsu019_u:827: dṛṣṭvā ca nārāyaṇaṃ sarve te parasparaṃ vicintayanti - atha balirasurendro mṛtaḥ kālagataḥ?
S04bsu019_u:829: atha te kathayanti - varamasmākaṃ saṃgrāmabhūmīmaraṇaṃ na tu bandhanabaddhānāṃ maraṇam /
S04bsu019_u:834: atha te rājānaḥ sarve svakaṃ svakaṃ gṛhaṃ gatāḥ /
S04bsu019_u:836: yadā te rathaṃ sajjīkurvanti mahārhāṇi śastrāṇi,
S04bsu019_u:837: tadā daśarathaputreṇa vāmanakarūpamabhinirmāya mṛgājinenottarya veṇudaṇḍamupagṛhya pīṭhikāmupagṛhya saṃprasthito matsakāśam /
S04bsu019_u:839: dvārapālairanubaddhaḥ - mā praviśa vāmanaka brāhmaṇa iti /
S04bsu019_u:844: atha sa dvārapālapuruṣo gatvā balimārocayati - deva,
S04bsu019_u:846: atha sa balistametadavocat - kīdṛśaṃ vastu yācate?
S04bsu019_u:847: atha sa dvārapālastametadavocat - deva na tamanujānāmi /
S04bsu019_u:858: śukra uvāca - jānāmyahaṃ tasya nimittāni cihnāni ca dṛṣṭvā /
S04bsu019_u:860: atha nārāyaṇena vicintya avaśyaṃ dānasya vipratisāraṃ bhaviṣyati /
S04bsu019_u:865: baliruvāca - yadi tvaṃ brāhmaṇa dvipadaṃ yācase,
S04bsu019_u:867: sa pratigrahaṃ tasyopagṛhya svastimupavadyānugṛhītaṃ tena tilapānīyasuvarṇasahitam /
S04bsu019_u:869: atha śukro balimetadavocat - rājan kathitaṃ mayā kālapuruṣa eṣa praviṣṭaḥ /
S04bsu019_u:870: na ca tvayā pramāṇaṃ kṛtaṃ vacanam /
S04bsu019_u:875: atha balirasurendro 'dhomukhaṃ prapatitaḥ smṛtibhraṣṭaḥ tharatharāyamānaḥ sthitaḥ /
S04bsu019_u:876: kiṃ kṛtya(?) svahastena mayā viṣaṃ bhakṣitam /
S04bsu019_u:879: tadā sa kathayati - tṛtīyasya padaṃ na saṃvidyate /
S04bsu019_u:882: atha nārāyaṇastametadavocat - yatrāhaṃ sthāpayāmi tatra tvayā sthātavyam /
S04bsu019_u:883: (Vaidya 275) atha sa balirasurendrastametadavocat - yādṛśaṃ tvayājñaptaṃ tādṛśaṃ karomyaham /
S04bsu019_u:889: tā api ca kumārikāḥ pāṇḍavaiḥ kauravairvidhvaṃsitāḥ /
S04bsu019_u:890_0: tāni ca suvarṇamayāni siṃhāsanāni divyāni cchatrāṇyupānahāni ratnapariveṣṭitāni ca
S04bsu019_u:890_1: vastrābharaṇāni ca suvarṇaghaṇṭāni suvarṇakaṭakāni ratnakhacitāni kapilāni kauravapāṇḍavairvidhvaṃsitāni /
S04bsu019_u:892: atha sa balirasurendro yajñabhūmerniṣkrāntaḥ śarīracintāmāpede - dātā balirudārayajñamupāsya /
S04bsu019_u:895: yathaiva kartā sartā sa nītvā pātālamupasthāpitaḥ sāntaḥpuraparivāraḥ /
S04bsu019_u:896: ākhyātaṃ hi mayā bhagavan - bhūtapūrvaṃ kurukṣetre mayā dānaṃ dattaṃ tasyaitatkarmaphalamanubhavāmi /
S04bsu019_u:899: atha balistaṃ bhagavantamāryāvalokiteśvaraṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvaṃ stotraviśeṣaiḥ stotumārabdhaḥ - trāṇaṃ bhavāhi śubhapadmahasta /
S04bsu019_u:921: mucyante te kārasūtrai rauravopapanneṣu avīcyupapanneṣu pretanagaropapanneṣu ye tava nāmadheyamanusmaranti /
S04bsu019_u:926_0: atha āryāvalokiteśvaro balerindrasya vyākaraṇamanuprayacchati sma - bhaviṣyasi tvamasurendra
S04bsu019_u:926_1: śrīrnāma tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho vidyācaraṇasaṃpannaḥ sugato lokavidanuttaraḥ
S04bsu019_u:926_2: puruṣadamyasārathiḥ śāstā devānāṃ ca manuṣyāṇāṃ ca buddho bhagavān /
S04bsu019_u:928: tatra tava buddhakṣetre na rāgaśabdo na dveṣaśabdo na mohaśabdo bhaviṣyati /
S04bsu019_u:931: śatasahasramūlyaṃ muktāhāramupanāmitaṃ maulīkuṇḍalaṃ ca nānāratnasamuccitamupanāmitaṃ ca //
S04bsu019_u:932: atha āryāvalokiteśvaro dharmadeśanāṃ kartumārabdhaḥ - śṛṇu mahārāja /
S04bsu019_u:933: nitye dhruve śāśvate mānuṣyake ye cintayanti satataparigrahaṃ mahābhogānyanuvicintayanti dāsīdāsakarmakarapauruṣeyān,
S04bsu019_u:936: ajñānāste sattvā ye putradāradārikāmanuvicintayanti bhāryāṃ mātāpitarau /
S04bsu019_u:942: ye ca mahārhā vṛkṣāstān pradīptān saprajvalitānekajvālībhūtān paśyanti /
S04bsu019_u:945: tvaritaṃ tvaritaṃ kṣuradhāropacite mahāpathe pādā viśīryante /

S04bsu019_u:950: tata ekaikapāde pañca pañcaśatāni kaṇṭakāni praviśanti /

S04bsu019_u:961: athe te yamapuruṣā nītvā kālasūtre mahānarake kṣipanti /
S04bsu019_u:962: śikṣā caikaikaśaktiśataṃ kāye vidhyanti tadapi jīvati,
S04bsu019_u:963: dvitīyaṃ śaktiśataṃ kāye vidhyanti tadapi jīvati,
S04bsu019_u:964: tṛtīyaṃ śaktiśataṃ kāye vidhyanti tadapi jīvati /
S04bsu019_u:965: yadā kalaṃ na kurvanti tadāgnikhadāmadhye kṣipanti /

S04bsu019_u:971: evameva hā rājan na kaścit trātā bhaviṣyati paraloke /
S04bsu019_u:972: tasmāttarhi taṃ mahārāja yatnena puṇyaṃ kartavyam /
S04bsu019_u:973: evaṃ sānulomikīṃ dharmadeśanāṃ kṛtvā ca taṃ rājānaṃ balimasurendramevamāha - apramattena bhavitavyam,
S04bsu019_u:979: mamāntikāddharmadeśanāṃ śṛṇvato niravaśeṣāṇi pāpaskandhāni na ca supariśuddhāni /
S04bsu019_u:982: tatra ca tava saptaratnamayaṃ padmāsanaṃ prādurbhūtaṃ bhaviṣyati /

S04bsu019_u:984: śrutvā ca tatraiva vyākaraṇamanuprāpsyase anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau,
S04bsu019_u:988_0: atha āryāvalokiteśvaro bodhisattvo mahāsattvastasya ca balerasurendrasya imaṃ sarvadurgatipariśodhanaṃ
S04bsu019_u:988_1: bodhisattvālaṃkārakāraṇḍavyūhaṃ nāma dharmālokaṃ deśayitvā taṃ rājānaṃ balimasurendraṃ
S04bsu019_u:997: tadā te devā nāgā yakṣā rākṣasā asurā garuḍāḥ kinnarā mahoragā manuṣyāḥ saṃnipatitāḥ /
S04bsu019_u:999_0: atha teṣāṃ bodhisattvenāṃ madhye gaganagañjo nāma bodhisattva utthāyāsanādekāṃsamuttarāsaṅgaṃ
S04bsu019_u:999_1: kṛtvā dakṣiṇaṃ jānumaṇḍalaṃ pṛthivyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpya yena bhagavāṃstenāñjaliṃ praṇamya
S04bsu019_u:1000: bhagavānāha - eṣa kulaputra avalokiteśvaro bodhisattvo mahāsattvo balerasurendrasya bhavane viharati,
S04bsu019_u:1004: atha gaganagañjo bodhisattvo mahāsattvo bhagavantametadavocat - kenopāyena paśyeyamahamavalokiteśvaraṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvam?
S04bsu019_u:1006: yadā avalokiteśvaro bodhisattvo mahāsattvo balerasurendrasya bhavanānniṣkrāntaḥ,
S04bsu019_u:1007: tadā jetavane mahāvihāre divyāni puṣpavarṣāṇi patanti,
S04bsu019_u:1012: lohitadaṇḍāni suvarṇarūpyapatrāṇi anekāni puṣpavṛkṣaśatāni anekāni puṣkariṇīśatāni puṣpaparipūrṇāni paramaśobhanīyāni prādurbhūtāni //
S04bsu019_u:1013: atha gaganagañjo bodhisattvo mahāsattvo bhagavantametadavocat - nāgacchati bhagavannavalokiteśvaro bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ?
S04bsu019_u:1014_0: bhagavānāha - eṣa kulaputra tato balerasurendrasya bhavanānniṣkamya paramabhīṣaṇīyaṃ
S04bsu019_u:1014_1: tamondhakāraṃ nāma pṛthivīpradeśaṃ yakṣarākṣasānāṃ bhūmiṃ amanuṣyāvacaramapṛthivīpradeśaṃ tatra gacchati /
S04bsu019_u:1016: tatra ca pṛthivīpradeśe varado nāma cintāmaṇiratnarājo 'sti /
S04bsu019_u:1023: dhāvitvā pādayoḥ praṇipatya saṃbhāṣayanti - mā tvaṃ bhagavan śrāntaklānto yastvaṃ cirakālena dṛṣṭaḥ,
S04bsu019_u:1028: atha te sarve yakṣarākṣasā divyasuvarṇaratnamayaṃ siṃhāsanaṃ prasamayanti tasyāvalokiteśvarasyārthe vicitraiḥ puṣpamayaiḥ saṃchāditam,
S04bsu019_u:1030: sa tairyakṣarākṣasairnītvā tatra divyasuvarṇaratnamaye siṃhāsane viśrāmitaḥ /
S04bsu019_u:1031: tataḥ avalokiteśvarasteṣāṃ yakṣarākṣasānāṃ dharma deśayati - śṛṇvattu bhavantaḥ /
S04bsu019_u:1032: āryakāraṇḍavyūhasya mahāyānasūtraratnarājasya catuṣpādikāmapi gāthāṃ ye śroṣyanti,
S04bsu019_u:1036: tadyathāpi nāma kulaputrāḥ śakyaṃ mayā paramāṇurajasāṃ pramāṇamudgrahītum,
S04bsu019_u:1037: na tu kulaputrāḥ śakyaṃ mayā kāraṇḍavyūhasya mahāyānasūtraratnarājasya puṇyaskandhaṃ gaṇayitum /
S04bsu019_u:1038: tadyathāpi nāma kulaputrāḥ śakyaṃ mayā mahāsamudrasyaikamudakabinduṃ gaṇayitum,
S04bsu019_u:1039: na tu kulaputrāḥ śakyaṃ mayā kāraṇḍavyūhasya mahāyānasūtraratnarājasya catuṣpādikāyā api gāthāyāḥ puṇyaskandhaṃ gaṇayitum /
S04bsu019_u:1040: tadyathāpi nāma kulaputrāḥ dvādaśagaṅgānadīvālukopamāstathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhādvādaśakalpānekasthāne dhārayeyuḥ,
S04bsu019_u:1042: te 'pi tathāgatāḥ sarve sahitā bhūtvā kāraṇḍavyūhasya mahāyānasūtraratnarājasya catuṣpādikāyā api gāthāyāḥ puṇyaskandhaṃ gaṇayituṃ na śaknuvanti sma,
S04bsu019_u:1044: tadyathāpi nāma kulaputrāścaturmahādvīpeṣvekaikadvīpapramāṇaṃ gṛhaṃ vihāraṃ vā kārayeddivyasuvarṇaratnamayam,
S04bsu019_u:1045: tatra gṛhe vihāre vā stūpasahasraṃ kuryāt,
S04bsu019_u:1048: tato bahutaraṃ kāraṇḍavyūhasya mahāyānasūtraratnarājasya catuṣpādikāyā api gāthāyāḥ puṇyaskandham /
S04bsu019_u:1049: tadyathāpi nāma kulaputrāḥ pañca mahānadyo sahasranadīparivārā mahāsamudramupasaṃkrāmanti,
S04bsu019_u:1050: evameva kulaputrā asya kāraṇḍavyūhamahāyānasūtraratnarājasya catuṣpādikāmapi gāthāṃ śṛṇvatāṃ puṇyaughapravāhamupapravahati //
S04bsu019_u:1051: atha te yakṣarākṣasā avalokiteśvarametadavocan - ye sattvāḥ kāraṇḍavyūhaṃ mahāyānasūtraratnarājaṃ likhāpayiṣyanti,
S04bsu019_u:1053: sa āha - aprameyaṃ teṣāṃ kulaputrāḥ puṇyaskandhaṃ prabhavati /
S04bsu019_u:1058: te sahasraṃ putrāṇāṃ śūrāṇāṃ vīrāṇāṃ varāṅgarūpiṇāṃ parasainyapramardakānāṃ janayanti /
S04bsu019_u:1063: tatra tatra jātau jātau jātismarā bhavanti /
S04bsu019_u:1068: na kadācit yakṣatvaṃ na rākṣasatvaṃ na pretatvaṃ na piśācatvaṃ na pūtanātvaṃ na kaṭapūtanātvaṃ na manuṣyadāridryaṃ pratyanubhaviṣyanti /
S04bsu019_u:1069: gaṅgānadīvālukāsamānāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ sevāpuṇyaskandhena samanvāgatā bhaviṣyanti /
S04bsu019_u:1070: ye 'pi kecit kulaputrāḥ sattvā asmāt kāraṇḍavyūhamahāyānasūtraratnarājādekākṣaramapi nāmadheyamapi catuṣpādikāmapi gāthāṃ likhāpayiṣyanti,
S04bsu019_u:1071: teṣāṃ pañcānantaryāṇi karmāṇi niravaśeṣaṃ parikṣayaṃ gamiṣyanti /
S04bsu019_u:1076: teṣāṃ na kaścit kāye vyādhiḥ prabhaviṣyati /
S04bsu019_u:1077: na cakṣurogaṃ na śrotrarogaṃ na ghrāṇarogaṃ na jihvārogaṃ na kāyarogam /
S04bsu019_u:1080: na mleccheṣu na pāpakuleṣu norabhrikeṣu na kaukkuṭikeṣu na jatyeṣu(?)
S04bsu019_u:1083: atha āryāvalokiteśvaro bodhisattvo mahāsattva evaṃ teṣāṃ yakṣarākṣasānāṃ tamondhakāravāsināṃ sarveṣāṃ cānulomikāṃ dharmadeśanāṃ kṛtavān /
S04bsu019_u:1084: te yakṣarākṣasāstāṃ dharmadeśanāṃ śubhāṃ śrutvā kecit srotaāpattiphale pratiṣṭhitāḥ /
S04bsu019_u:1089: ato yenāryāvalokiteśvaro bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ tenopasaṃkramya pādayoḥ praṇipatya evaṃ kathayanti - ihaiva bhagavan viharasva,
S04bsu019_u:1092: vayaṃ ca tavāntike asminneva tamondhakārabhūmau tavārthāya divyāni sauvarṇamayāni caṃkramaṇāni kariṣyāmaḥ /
S04bsu019_u:1095: atha āryāvalokiteśvaro bodhisattvo mahāsattvastāṃśca yakṣarākṣasānetadavocat - anekāni ca mayā kulaputrāḥ sattvāni bodhimārge niyojayitavyāni /
S04bsu019_u:1096: atha te sarve yakṣarākṣasāḥ kare kapolaṃ dattvā cintāparā vyavasthitāḥ /
S04bsu019_u:1097: te parasparamevamāhuḥ - gamiṣyati ayamasmākamavalokiteśvaro bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'nyataraṃ pṛthivīpradeśam,
S04bsu019_u:1100: atha āryāvalokiteśvaro bodhisattvo mahāsattvastasyāstamondhakārāyā bhūmyāḥ saṃprasthitaḥ /
S04bsu019_u:1101: atha te tamondhakāraprativāsino yakṣarākṣasāstasya bhagavato 'valokiteśvarasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya pṛṣṭhataḥ pṛṣṭhataḥ samanubaddhā gacchanti sma /
S04bsu019_u:1104: te yakṣarākṣasāḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā triḥpradakṣiṇīkṛtya tatraiva ca prakrāntāḥ //
S04bsu019_u:1113: tatra devanikāyeṣu sukuṇḍalo nāma devaputro daridro duścittaśceti /
S04bsu019_u:1114: atha āryāvalokiteśvaraḥ sa tena brāhmaṇarūpeṇa tasya devaputrasya sakāśamupasaṃkrāntaḥ /
S04bsu019_u:1115: upasaṃkramya sarveṣāṃ devānāṃ dāridryaduḥkhavyupaśamāya taṃ devaputrametadavocat - bubhukṣito 'haṃ tṛṣitaśceti /
S04bsu019_u:1116: atha sa devaputro rudaṃstaṃ brāhmaṇametadavocat - na ca me brāhmaṇa kiṃcitsaṃvidyate /
S04bsu019_u:1118: atha sa devaputro vimānaṃ praviśya sarvabhāṇḍaṃ nirabhyavekṣitumārabdhaḥ /
S04bsu019_u:1119: sa ca paripatitaṃ niveśanaṃ divyairmahārhai ratnabhāṇḍaiḥ paripūrṇaṃ dakṣiṇapārśvam,
S04bsu019_u:1120: anyāni ca bhāṇḍāni divyarasarasāgropetairāhāraiḥ paripūrṇāni vāmapārśve vimānasya vastrābharaṇaiḥ sarvapuṣpagandhādibhiḥ paripūrṇāni //
S04bsu019_u:1121: atha sa devaputra etad dṛṣṭaivaṃ cintāmāpede - avaśyamayaṃ sa satpātro dvāre sthito yasya darśanamātreṇāpidṛśī lakṣmīrmamānuprāptā /
S04bsu019_u:1122: atha sa devaputrastaṃ brāhmaṇamāhūyaivamāha - ehi brāhmaṇa,
S04bsu019_u:1124: sa ca brāhmaṇastena devaputreṇa vimāne praviśya tairdivyaratnaiḥ pratipāditaḥ,
S04bsu019_u:1128: atha sa devaputrastaṃ brāhmaṇametadavocat - bho brāhmaṇa,
S04bsu019_u:1131: atha sa devaputrastametadavocat - kīdṛśī sā bhūmiḥ?
S04bsu019_u:1132: atha sa brāhmaṇo devaputrametadavocat - tathāgatādhyuṣitā sā bhūmī ramaṇīyā divyamaṇiratnaparikhacitā pariśobhitā /
S04bsu019_u:1136: vividhāśca śīlavanto guṇavanto dakṣiṇīyā dṛśyante viśvabhuvaḥ /
S04bsu019_u:1139: atha sa devaputrastaṃ brāhmaṇametadavocat - avaśyaṃ tvayā brāhmaṇa satyaṃ pratyāhāraḥ kartavyaḥ /
S04bsu019_u:1142: na ca manuṣyasyedṛśaṃ nimittaṃ bhavati yādṛśaṃ tava nimittaṃ bhavati /
S04bsu019_u:1147: upanāmayitvā ca sa devaputra imāṃ gāthāṃ bhāṣita(vān) -
S04bsu019_u:1150: atha sa devaputra imāṃ gāthāṃ bhāṣitvā tatraiva prakrāntaḥ //
S04bsu019_u:1156: atha sa brāhmaṇaḥ tasmāddevanikāyādavatīrya siṃhaladvīpaṃ pratyudgataḥ /
S04bsu019_u:1157: gatvā ca rākṣasīnāṃ purato vyavasthitaḥ kāmarūpamātmānamabhinirmāya prāsādikam /
S04bsu019_u:1158: atha tā rākṣasyo 'nyonyamevamāhuḥ - ayamīdṛśaṃ paramakāmarūpī puruṣo dṛśyate /
S04bsu019_u:1159: atha taṃ dṛṣṭvā ca tadā tāsāṃ rākṣasīnāṃ kāmacittamutpannam /
S04bsu019_u:1160: tadā tasya sakāśamupasaṃkramyaitadavocan - bhavāṃstvaṃ bhajasva asmākaṃ kumārīyauvanam,
S04bsu019_u:1169: imāni te 'nnagṛhāṇi pānagṛhāṇi vastragṛhāṇi vividhāni vicitrāṇi śayanāni udyānaramaṇīyāni puṣkiriṇīramayāṇi //
S04bsu019_u:1172: tāśca tamāhuḥ - kathaṃ vayaṃ tavājñāṃ na kariṣyāmaḥ?
S04bsu019_u:1176: atha tā rākṣasyastasyapuruṣasyāntikādāryāṣṭāṅgikamārgaṃ gṛhītvā daśa kuśalāni ca saṃsmarya,
S04bsu019_u:1183: tadā tāsāṃ rākṣasīnāṃ rāgaduḥkhaṃ na bādhate /
S04bsu019_u:1190: evaṃ cāhuḥ - punarapi na prāṇātipātaṃ kurvāmaḥ /
S04bsu019_u:1191: yādṛśena jāmbudvīpakā manuṣyā jīvanti annena pānena,
S04bsu019_u:1195: tādṛśaṃ śikṣāsaṃvaramupagṛhītvā tasyaiva puruṣasya purato 'nimiṣairnayanaiḥ prekṣamāṇāḥ prasthitāḥ //
S04bsu019_u:1200: atha āryāvalokiteśvaro bodhisattvo mahāsattvastasmātsiṃhaladvīpādavatīrya vārāṇasyāṃ mahānagaryāmuccāraprasrāvasthāne gato yatrānekānyanekāni kṛmikulaśatasahasrāṇi prativasanti /
S04bsu019_u:1201: tato 'valokiteśvaro bodhisattvo mahāsattva upasaṃkramya tatrāsa tāni prāṇiśatasahasrāṇi dṛṣṭvā ātmānaṃ bhramararūpamabhinirmāya ghuṇaghuṇāyamāṇam /
S04bsu019_u:1205: tacchrutvā te ca sarve prāṇakāḥ namo buddhāya namo dharmāya namaḥ saṃghāyeti nāmamanusmārayanti /
S04bsu019_u:1206_0: te ca sarve buddhanāmasmaraṇamātreṇa viṃśatiśikharasamudgataṃ satkāyadṛṣṭiśailaṃ
S04bsu019_u:1206_1: jñānavajreṇa bhittvā sarve te sukhāvatyāṃ lokadhātāvupapannāḥ sugandhamukhā nāma
S04bsu019_u:1207: sarve te bhagavato 'mitābhasya tathāgatasyāntikādidaṃ kāraṇḍavyūhaṃ nāma mahāyānaṃ śrutvā anumodya ca nānādigbhyo vyākaraṇāni pratilabdhāni //
S04bsu019_u:1209: atha āryāvalokiteśvaro bodhisattvo mahāsattvo sattvaparipākaṃ kṛtvā tasyā vārāṇasyā mahānagaryāḥ prakrāntaḥ //
S04bsu019_u:1216: yāvat sattvān paśyanti sma parasparaṃ māṃsabhakṣaṇaṃ kurvāṇān /
S04bsu019_u:1220: viṃśativarṣāṇi paripūrṇāni kāntārasya ca pratipannasya ca /
S04bsu019_u:1224: atha avalokiteśvaro bodhisattvaścintāmāpede - kenopāyenāhaṃ sattvān sarvān sukhopadhānaistasmātkāntārānmahādārūṇādakālamaraṇātparimocayeyaṃ saṃtarpayeyam?
S04bsu019_u:1228: tadā paścāddivyāni piṣṭakāni rasarasāgropetāni tenāhāreṇa paripūrṇāni /
S04bsu019_u:1229: yadāhāreṇa saṃtarpitā bhavanti tadā dhānyavarṣāṇi patanti,
S04bsu019_u:1231: vividhāni ca vastrābharaṇāni ca pravarṣanti sma /
S04bsu019_u:1232: yadā yadā teṣāṃ sarveṣāṃ sattvānāṃ ke 'pyabhiprāyā bhavanti,
S04bsu019_u:1234: atha te māgadhakāḥ sattvāstadidaṃ vicitraṃ svātmasukhaṃ dṛṣṭvā duḥkhaṃ ca vyupaśāntam,
S04bsu019_u:1238: tatasteṣāṃ puruṣāṇāṃ madhye jīrṇo vṛddho mahallakaḥ kubjo gopāṇasīvakro 'dhibhagno dāṇḍaparāyaṇaḥ anekavarṣaśatasahasrāyuṣikaḥ /
S04bsu019_u:1239: sa teṣāṃ madhye sthitvā kathayati - na yuṣmākamanyadevasya kasyacidīdṛśaṃ prabhāvo bhavati virahitādavalokiteśvarasya /
S04bsu019_u:1240: tatastā parṣadaḥ pṛcchanti - kīdṛśaṃ tasya nimittamavalokiteśvarasya?
S04bsu019_u:1241: atha sa puruṣa āryāvalokiteśvarasya guṇodbhāvanāṃ bhāṣitumārabdhaḥ -
S04bsu019_u:1251: sukhitāste sattvā loke ye tasya nāmamanusmaranti /
S04bsu019_u:1253: sacetanāste puruṣapuṃgavā ye avalokiteśvarasya satataparigrahaṃ puṣpadhūpaṃ niryātayanti /
S04bsu019_u:1257: aśvaratnaṃ hastiratnaṃ maṇiratnaṃ strīratnaṃ gṛhapatiratnaṃ pariṇāyakaratnam /
S04bsu019_u:1262: yatra yatropapadyante tatra tatra parīpūrṇakāyāśca bhavanti /
S04bsu019_u:1266: atha sa jīrṇapurūṣaḥ ānulomikīṃ dharmadeśanāṃ kṛtvā svakaṃ gṛhaṃ niveśanaṃ pratyudgataḥ /

S04bsu019_u:2538: te vārāṇasyāṃ mahānagaryāmuccāraprasrāve gūḍhamṛttikodare prāṇino jāyante /
S04bsu019_u:2543: hīnendriyā dagdhasthūṇākṛtibhirasthipatravaducchritaiḥ svakeśaromapraticchannaiḥ parvatodarasaṃnibhaiḥ sūcīchidropamamukhaiḥ kāye īdṛśaṃ te duḥkhaṃ pratyanubhavanti /
S04bsu019_u:2554: evaṃ te bahūni varṣaśatāni kāyikaṃ duḥkhaṃ pratyanubhavanti /
S04bsu019_u:2556: te dvādaśa kalpān raurave mahānarake upapadyante /
S04bsu019_u:2564: tadā bhikṣavaḥ karmavāyavo vānti yena te mṛtāḥ purūṣāḥ punareva jīvanti /
S04bsu019_u:2566: tataḥ teṣāṃ karmopagānāṃ karmavaśānāṃ mahatī jihvā prādurbhavati /
S04bsu019_u:2568: evaṃ te bahūni varṣaśatāni bahūni varṣasahasrāṇi bahūni varṣaśatasahasrāṇi nārakaṃ duḥkhaṃ pratyanubhavanti /
S04bsu019_u:2570: tataste yamapālapuruṣā gṛhītvā ca tasya jihvāyāṃ sūcīśatasahasraṃ vidhyanti /
S04bsu019_u:2576: evaṃ parikramatāṃ teṣāṃ trayaḥ kalpāḥ parīkṣīyante /
S04bsu019_u:2585: ye śīlavanto guaṇavantaḥ prajñāvantastairbhikṣava imāni śikṣāpadāni mayā prajñaptāni dhārayitavyāni /
S04bsu019_u:2586: asatparibhogena bhikṣavo na paribhoktavyaṃ sāṃghikaṃ vastu agnighaṭopamam /
S04bsu019_u:2591: na tu sāṃghikasya vastunaḥ pratikāraṃ kartuṃ śakyate //
S04bsu019_u:2599: āyuṣmānānando bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā prakrāntaḥ /
S04bsu019_u:2600: atha te mahāśrāvakāḥ svakaṃ svakaṃ buddhakṣetraṃ prakrāntāḥ /
S04bsu019_u:2601: te ca devā nāgā yakṣā gandharvā asurā garuḍāḥ kinnarā mahoragā manuṣyāḥ,
S04bsu019_u:2606: te ca bodhisattvāḥ sā ca sarvāvatī parṣat sadevamānuṣāsuragandharvaśca loko bhagavato bhāṣitamabhyanandanniti //
S04bsu019_u:2610: ye dharma hetuprabhavā hetusteṣāṃ tathāgato hyavadat /
S04bsu019_u:2611: teṣāṃ ca yo nirodha evaṃ vādī mahāśramaṇaḥ //
